title: billygam007
author: billygam007
content: Hi.I inventoried my old coins, found a very interesting one – Americancoin AMC (fork Litecoin).  Mined by AMC in 2014. I installed an old wallet from 2013. It's fully operational today! The original blockchain. There was an idea to sell some of the coins and revive AMC. We need money and help from the crypto community.The prospects for the development and market of AMC are huge:1. The first attempt to create a national digital coin of the USA.2. After 10 years, the original wallet is alive, the coin is not forgotten.3. Most of the mined coins have already been lost, the value is increasing.4. If you add to any exchange and the availability of modern support, there will be a rocket.I will sell my coins 1AMC = 0.05$. The minimum transaction is 5 USDT. I am ready to send 1 AMC for confirmation before purchase to the buyer's wallet. We need money for the development of Americancoin.I will be very grateful for your help in support (creating a website, block explorer, updated wallet, listing). The reward for these actions can be given now only in the AMC.It is also an original Christmas gift (wallet + coins) .I will share my successes and my thoughts in this forum thread.

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
comments.body: I'd like to help in the development (website explorer etc.). Do you have a discord group where we could discuss in private?

comments.author: billygam007
comments.body: You need to write here or in private messages.

comments.author: Kliv73
comments.body: you found a lot of old coins and now you want to sell them to someone?That's very silly.

comments.author: billygam007
comments.body: There are a lot of coins, but this is the most promising one. You'd have to be a fool not to see the potential. Like a rarity.

comments.author: Branden_crypto
comments.body: I inventoried my old panties, found some interesting ones. Bought in WalMart in 2014. I use an old one from 2013. It's fully operational today! The original panties. There was an idea to sell some of them and revive my wardrobe. We need money and help from the crypto community.It is also an original Christmas gift (panties + chemical burn marks)  .You'd be a fool not to see the potential. Like a rarity.I will share my successes and my thoughts in this forum thread.Wanna buy?

comments.author: MiningCoinsPool
comments.body: Quote from: billygam007 on December 02, 2023, 05:58:40 PMCan someone else confirm? Compiled from github.comIf you really compiled from github, you wouldn'T have those two extra .dll files in your .zip bro. Stop pretending, just stop.  Get a life for real, this is beyond pathetic. Why you steal from people?

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: billygam007 on December 02, 2023, 05:58:40 PMCan someone else confirm? Compiled from github.comI checked the file with Virustotal and it showed that there is one warning that the file contains Bitcoin Miner (PUA). But Virustotal is not an indicator, because there is that nasty stuff that Virustotal can't detect. Here's a link to check it out.
